start.text:
Incoming mail:

Sender: support@universal-parts.univ
Subject: IMPORTANT! PRODUCT RECALL

Dear customer, all Type 543-B screws made 124 months ago, having a serial number between 31293920373000 and 31294072971000 are being recalled for failure issues.

Please send them back as soon as possible, informations are provided in attached document.

choices.text: “They've been working fine for now, if it's not broken, don't fix it!“ [ignore it]
“I better check with Aude where I used them“

aude_estimation_minor_risk.text: Aude: “These screws are used all around the ship for storage facilities like closets, drawers, human-usable doors. It would take approximately two full days to replace them“

choices.text: “I will repair them on the spot if they break“ [do nothing]

aude_estimation_major_risk.text: Aude: “These screws are used in your homemade asteroids deflectors automatic turrets. It would take one day and 15 €€€ of consumable to replace them“

choices.text: ”I would never let my beautiful turrets be sub-optimally assembled!” [repair them for 15 €€€]

turret-repaired.text: You replaced you turrets screws, they now look brand new

failing_screw_minor.text: From time to time, these Type 543-B screws, used in closets, drawers, human-usable doors, fails and you have to repair them. It's not a big deal, but annoying.

failing_screw_major.text: One day, you are woken up by a critical alarm, an asteroid did pass your station's defenses and made a hole in the hull. Emergency repairs drones were deployed and worked well.

failing_screw_major_2.text: The issue was one of your homemade asteroids deflectors automatic turrets which could not rotate on the x-axis anymore because a screw broke.

choices.text: “A SCREW? A DAMNED SCREW? Aude, don't tell me.. is it THIS screw?“

aude_answer.text: Aude: “Yes, it was a Type 543-B that failed. The same type that was recalled by UNIVERSAL-PARTS some time ago, but your refused to replace them, remember?“

choices.text: ”You don't need to take that paternalistic tone with me. How much will it cost?”

aude_price.text: Aude: ”Emergency one-time use drones are not cheap to operate, it will cost 200 €€€ to replenish them, and 300 €€€ to fix the hull”

choices.text: “I don't have the money right now, I will take the risk to keep things like they are“

repair-all.text: Everything is repaired now, you changed the screws too..

nothing_repaired.text: Nothing is repaired, you will have to hope no other asteroid come close any time soon.
